concept.title: create_a_topic
concept.conbody:
>
Create a Topic
Each topic type enables you to insert specific elements.
In the content library, navigate to a folder and click Create New.
Select the topic type you want to create.
Figure 1. Create New Topic Window
Enter a title and file name.
**Optional: ** Create the file in a folder different than the current folder by clicking Change and selecting a new location. The save location is modified.
**Optional: ** Assign the file to collections by clicking Collections and selecting collections from the list. Collections are selected.
**Optional: ** Assign metadata to the file by filling in the Metadata fields. Metadata is selected.
Do one of the following:
To create and open the file, click Create & Edit .
To create the file and return to the content library, click Create .
